plugins.photosPermission: Allow generativeAi to access your photos.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow access to your camera so that you can upload a profile picture or submit photos to demonstrate positive actions you have taken in the app.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Allow access to your camera so that you can upload a profile picture or submit photos to demonstrate positive actions you have taken in the app.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow access to your photo library so that you can upload a profile picture or submit photos to demonstrate positive actions you have taken in the app.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: generativeAi would like to use your location to show you actions available in your area and to validate actions you take in the app.
